mapper.insert: insert into goods_content_sku ( sku_id, content_id, sku, stock, weight, length, wide, height, price, price_market, price_cost, property, sales_volume, sales_amount, rank_average, viewed, rev, sort_order, attachmentids, is_shelf, is_del, ctime, mtime )values ( #{skuId}, #{contentId}, #{sku}, #{stock}, #{weight}, #{length}, #{wide}, #{height}, #{price}, #{priceMarket}, #{priceCost}, #{property}, #{salesVolume}, #{salesAmount}, #{rankAverage}, #{viewed}, #{rev}, #{sortOrder}, #{attachmentids}, #{isShelf}, #{isDel}, #{ctime}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update:
update goods_content_sku
sku_id=#{skuId},
content_id=#{contentId},
sku=#{sku},
stock=#{stock},
weight=#{weight},
length=#{length},
wide=#{wide},
height=#{height},
price=#{price},
price_market=#{priceMarket},
price_cost=#{priceCost},
property=#{property},
sales_volume=#{salesVolume},
sales_amount=#{salesAmount},
rank_average=#{rankAverage},
viewed=#{viewed},
rev=#{rev},
sort_order=#{sortOrder},
attachmentids=#{attachmentids},
is_shelf=#{isShelf},
is_del=#{isDel},
ctime=#{ctime},
mtime=#{mtime},
sku_id=#{skuId}
mapper.select: select sku_id, content_id, sku, stock, weight, length, wide, height, price, price_market, price_cost, property, sales_volume, sales_amount, rank_average, viewed, rev, sort_order, attachmentids, is_shelf, is_del, ctime, mtime from goods_content_sku where sku_id=#{skuId}

select sku_id, content_id, sku, stock, weight, length, wide, height, price, price_market, price_cost, property, sales_volume, sales_amount, rank_average, viewed, rev, sort_order, attachmentids, is_shelf, is_del, ctime, mtime from goods_content_sku where sku_id=#{skuId}

select sku_id, content_id, sku, stock, weight, length, wide, height, price, price_market, price_cost, property, sales_volume, sales_amount, rank_average, viewed, rev, sort_order, attachmentids, is_shelf, is_del, ctime, mtime
order by sort_order desc limit #{offset},#{rows}

select sku_id, content_id, sku, stock, weight, length, wide, height, price, price_market, price_cost, property, sales_volume, sales_amount, rank_average, viewed, rev, sort_order, attachmentids, is_shelf, is_del, ctime, mtime from goods_content_sku where and sku_id in
#{skuId}
